content.rendered:
Beta 4 addresses two bugs posted on our forums:

  1. Javascript errors that are stopping Post Editor Tags and Help Tabs.
  2. Frontend Widgets not working.

We also replace the standard WordPress “Right Now” Dashboard widget with one that supports Custom Post Types and Taxonomies.

Grab it at your local WordPress repository >

excerpt.rendered: Beta 4 addresses two bugs posted on our forums: Javascript errors that are stopping Post Editor Tags and Help Tabs. And Frontend Widgets not working. We also replace the standard WordPress “Right Now” Dashboard widget with one that supports Custom Post Types and Taxonomies.
